name: MRU:LV-246 Escape from Hadley's Hope
description:
Latest update:
.Random background.
.Score!
.Bullet time and its powerup.
.Much more!
...

Aliens are running amok bombing all human facilities.
Reach outpost 7 and try to escape the mayhem!

The game features:

.Eternal amount of tracks, never play the same game!
.Superb ufo hive behaviour, be surprised!
.Catastrophically destructable terrain and bridges, care for it!
.Do care!...as you may have to traverse it a few times.
.Game style define power ups, always procedurally fresh!
.Mind corroding difficulty escalation, look alive!
...and much more!

Make your best shot!
It can take it.
